prompt: Create a vibrant tropical quiz results page with 'Quiz Completed!' header, circular score indicator, summary card with score, time, accuracy, horizontal rounded buttons, and color-coded sun-icon answer breakdown.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Color(0xFFE1F5FE),
      appBar: AppBar(
        title: Text('Quiz Results', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.white)),
        backgroundColor: Colors.coral[600],
        elevation: 0,
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(20.0),
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
              children: [
                Icon(Icons.beach_access, color: Colors.coral[800], size: 28),
                SizedBox(width: 8),
                Text('Quiz Completed!', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 28, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.coral[800])),
                SizedBox(width: 8),
                Icon(Icons.beach_access, color: Colors.coral[800], size: 28),
              ],
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Container(
              width: 140,
              height: 140,
              decoration: BoxDecoration(
                shape: BoxShape.circle,
                color: Colors.turquoise[300],
                border: Border.all(color: Colors.yellow[600]!, width: 8),
              ),
              child: Center(
                child: Column(
                  mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
                  children: [
                    Text('85%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 34, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.coral[800])),
                    Text('Score', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 14, color: Colors.coral[600])),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Card(
              color: Colors.yellow[100],
              elevation: 4,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
                child: Column(
                  crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                  children: [
                    Text('Total Score: 17/20', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.coral[800])),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Text('Time Taken: 5m 23s', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.black87)),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Text('Accuracy: 85%', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, fontWeight: FontWeight.w500, color: Colors.coral[800])),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.spaceEvenly,
              children: [
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.coral[600],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.white,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 20, vertical: 14),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)),
                  ),
                  child: Text('Review Answers', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600)),
                ),
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.turquoise[600],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.white,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 20, vertical: 14),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)),
                  ),
                  child: Text('Retake Quiz', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600)),
                ),
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.lime[600],
                    foregroundColor: Colors.black,
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 20, vertical: 14),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)),
                  ),
                  child: Text('Share Results', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, fontWeight: FontWeight.w600)),
                ),
              ],
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 24),
            Card(
              color: Colors.yellow[100],
              elevation: 4,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(12)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(20),
                child: Column(
                  crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                  children: [
                    Text('Answer Breakdown', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 18, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold, color: Colors.coral[800])),
                    SizedBox(height: 16),
                    Row(
                      children: [
                        Icon(Icons.wb_sunny, color: Colors.green[600], size: 22),
                        SizedBox(width: 8),
                        Text('Correct Answers: 17', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, color: Colors.green[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w500)),
                      ],
                    ),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Row(
                      children: [
                        Icon(Icons.wb_sunny, color: Colors.red[600], size: 22),
                        SizedBox(width: 8),
                        Text('Incorrect Answers: 3', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, color: Colors.red[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w500)),
                      ],
                    ),
                    SizedBox(height: 12),
                    Row(
                      children: [
                        Icon(Icons.wb_sunny, color: Colors.orange[600], size: 22),
                        SizedBox(width: 8),
                        Text('Skipped Questions: 0', style: TextStyle(fontSize: 15, color: Colors.orange[600], fontWeight: FontWeight.w500)),
                      ],
                    ),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
